v7_2_news_main_array_item_1_subtitle: Enjoy smoother navigation and a cleaner look when viewing your files.
v7_2_news_main_array_item_2_subtitle: A fresh, modern color picker that makes design feel effortless.
v7_2_news_main_array_item_3_subtitle: Status colors and tooltips are now standardized and easier to understand across the app.
v7_2_news_main_array_item_4_subtitle: Snackbars now show how much time they’ll stay on screen — and hovering pauses all dismiss timers.
v7_2_news_main_array_item_5_subtitle: User avatars now appear before display names — making it easier to recognize who did what at a glance.
v7_2_news_main_array_item_6_subtitle:
From now on we show in the admin panel, when, and by whom a user got deactivated (for users deactivated after October 24th, 2025, or after v7.0.13 got installed, the latter of the two)

In the invite dialog both from Share dropdown, and Advanced Invite, inputted users that are deactivated won't be shown, and a snackbar explaining the fact the users are deactivated will be shown

We now prevent adding deactivated users to organizations

Don't allow adding de-activated users to a JustDo.

Upon de-activation - remove de-activated users from all Orgs (the same way we remove them from all JustDos/Tasks) update the de-activation warning accordingly.

Keep a log of when, and by whom, a user got deactivated.
